sentences.sentence: Other ocular signs include involuntary rhythmic movement of the eyeball.
sentences.translation: 其它眼睛特征包括眼球无意识而有节奏的运动。

sentences.sentence: We will present an ocular demonstration.
Subconjunctival hemorrhages are very common ocular findings.
sentences.translation: 结膜下出血是十分常见的眼部表现。
